item.title: Jenkins CI/CD 03 - Building and Pushing Docker Images to GCR
item.description:
Google Container Registry is a service provided by Google for storing, managing, and securing Docker container images.
The objective at hand is to package a Docker image and push it to Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using the ‘gcloud’ command for future deployment purposes.

item.title: Jenkins CI/CD 02 Basic Pipeline Setup and GitHub Integration
item.description:
In Jenkins , the build process is known as a pipeline.
It can also be triggered through webhooks, offering various triggering and execution methods.
Below, we’ll demonstrate how to integrate GitHub webhooks and provide common trigger condition examples.
